project_descr: Aims to establish enduring institutional processes within government ministries and the wider stake-holders community to bring about sound management in the environment and also strengthening the role of environmental agencies and non-governmental actors

outputs.output_descr: Aims to establish enduring institutional processes within government ministries and the wider stakeholders community to bring about sound management of chemicals focusing on the government bodies responsible for poverty reduction and growth policies and also srentghening the role of environmetal agencies and non governmental actors

project_title: mainstreaming smc issues into mdg based planning
